meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6551.

td.p: Keith Whitener, a research chemist originally from Charlotte, North Carolina
Kristin Morgan, a strategic analyst for NASA from Huntsville, Alabama
Colby Burnett, a high school world history teacher from Chicago, Illinois

tr.td: NAME THE BIBLE BOOK
UMBRELLA POTPOURRI
END "SHIP"
3 LAST WORDS
VARIETY SLANGUAGE
NELSON MANDELA

with picks and shovels to get to
this four-letter residue, also known as calcium oxide')

here in the quarry,

with picks and shovels to get to
this four-letter residue, also known as calcium oxide
